mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review WHERE line_id=#{lineId} AND store_id=#{storeId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review WHERE line_id=#{lineId} AND store_id=#{storeId}
SELECT storeId,reviewRating FROM review INNER JOIN line USING(lineId) WHERE reviewRating > 5 AND memberId = #{intWord}

SELECT storeId,b.reviewRating as reviewRating,storeLatitude,storeLongitude FROM store INNER JOIN ( SELECT storeId,avg(reviewRating) as reviewRating FROM review GROUP BY storeId ) AS b USING (storeId) WHERE reviewRating > 5;
